FuncDef: This command enables generation of LDP MAC withdrawal "flush-all-from-me" in the B-VPLS domain when the following triggers occur in the related IVPLS:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to send an LDP flush all-but-mine and also sent into the B-VPLS. Both parameters can be set together.
Specifies to send an LDP flush-all-from and when STP initiates a flush, it is sent into the B-VPLS using LDP MAC flush all-from-me. Both parameters can be set together.
